about.description:
The Crowdin Python client is a lightweight interface to the Crowdin API.
It provides common services for making API requests.

Crowdin API is a full-featured RESTful API that helps you to integrate
localization into your development process. The endpoints that we use allow
you to easily make calls to retrieve information and to execute actions needed.
about.summary: Python client library for Crowdin API v2

about.description:
The Crowdin Python client is a lightweight interface to the Crowdin API.
It provides common services for making API requests.

Crowdin API is a full-featured RESTful API that helps you to integrate
localization into your development process. The endpoints that we use allow
you to easily make calls to retrieve information and to execute actions needed.
about.summary: Python client library for Crowdin API v2

name: crowdin-api-client
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "crowdin-api-client" %}
{% set version = "1.24.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name.replace('-', '_') }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d2a385c2b3f8e985d5bb084524ae14aef9045094fba0b2df1df82d9da97155b1


build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - deprecated
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - requests >=2.31.0
    - typing_extensions

test:
  imports:
    - crowdin_api
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
  commands:
    - pip check

about:
  home: https://github.com/crowdin/crowdin-api-client-python
  summary: Python client library for Crowdin API v2
  description: |
    The Crowdin Python client is a lightweight interface to the Crowdin API.
    It provides common services for making API requests.

    Crowdin API is a full-featured RESTful API that helps you to integrate
    localization into your development process. The endpoints that we use allow
    you to easily make calls to retrieve information and to execute actions needed.
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  doc_url: https://support.crowdin.com/api/v2/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - fcollonval
